text_block_list.text: On my day off, I decide to take a stroll<n>through town.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ohhh... Urrrgh...

And along the way, I happen across a<n>very familiar figure,
shaking in an<n>equally familiar way. Could she be<n>crying?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Wah! I-I'm sorry for loitering! I'll<n>move along right—

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Hm? Wait... Trainer? Ahhh, thank<n>goodness it's just you!
H-hello!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I-I, ummm... I came out to buy some<n>clothes, but... All these
stores are so<n>stylish... Am I really allowed to just<n>walk in?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
N-no, of course not! Someone like me<n>could never wear
such pretty things!<n>Th-the only thing that suits me is that<n>
plastic bag over there! I'll just wear<n>that!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
H-huh?! B-but I need new clothes...<n>All my others got
destroyed...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I-I was going through my clothes to<n>see what I don't wear
anymore... and<n>before I knew it, all my clothes were<n>torn to
shreds...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I-it's my fault, really... I shouldn't<n>have had the window
open...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I-I was just trying to bring some<n>fresh air into the room! I
never<n>expected my blouses and skirts to...<n>to... Ooohhh...

I... don't think I need to know any<n>more. In summary, it
sounds like Doto<n>needs new clothes, but she's too<n>
scared to enter the shops alone.
choice_data_list: In that case, why don't I join you?
In that case, why don't I join you?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huh?! No way!
A little harsh, but at least she told it to<n>me straight...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Ah, wait! I-i-it's not that I don't want<n>to go shopping with
you!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: It's just... N-never mind! I'm fine! I...<n>I...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I'll just wear plastic bags for the rest<n>of my liiiife!

She dashes off, but thanks to her long<n>skirt, she can't run
as fast as usual. I<n>might actually be able to catch up to<n>
her!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff... Huff... Wh-why?!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Why are you following me?!
Finally, we reach the end of our<n>chase...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Waaah! Wh-why do you keep<n>chasing me?!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Eep! I-I'm sorry! I really am!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
B-but I don't want to bother you! I<n>mean, today's supposed
to be your<n>day off!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
A-and if I take up your time even on<n>your day off... That
would make me<n>the worst of the worst!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
You already have to deal with me and<n>my blunders on an
almost daily basis...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I don't want to tire you out any more<n>than I already do... You
need a break...<n>away from me...

Setting aside the self-deprecating<n>way she expresses it,
Meisho Doto is<n>clearly trying to be considerate.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
That's why I was running away... But<n>then you had to go
and chase after<n>me! I'm telling you, I'll cause you<n>trouble!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Y-you do?! Wh-what?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ah, wait... Is this... Trainer... Are you...<n>into that sort of thing?

I explain that, as her trainer, it's only<n>natural that she takes
up a lot of my<n>time. In fact, I want her to trust me—to<n>lean
on me more.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: U-uh... If I were to l-l-lean on you... I'd<n>probably crush you...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
The minute we lock arms, I'd<n>probably trip and drag you
down with<n>me... Oooh, there'd be bits and pieces<n>
everywhere...
choice_data_list: But as long as I get back up, it's fine, right?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
choice_data_list: Don't worry so much. Just trust me.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I-I... Um... Thank you?
She seems a bit confused, but at leastnow she knows that she can askme for help when needed. It's up toher whether she takes me up on thator not.
choice_data_list: Now then... Let's get you some clothes!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ah... R-right!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Um... Then, uh... shall we?

The perpetually perplexed Meisho<n>Doto and I make our way
back to the<n>streets, ready to shop...

text_block_list.name: Staff
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry... We're closed for today.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Already?! W-we would've made it in<n>time if I hadn't run
away... I'm sorry...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: M-maybe I really am... destined to<n>wear plastic bags...

I comfort the crestfallen Meisho Doto.<n>Perhaps someday,
she'll ask me for<n>help of her own will, but until then, I'll<n>
just have to keep offering...
